text: 15:13 Ua Me Ini 1:1-14; Aposel 7:6Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God kamagh Abram mɨgɨa ghaze, “Nɨ bizir kam gɨfogh, nɨn ovavir boriba mangɨ kantrin igharazimɨn aven nguibar igharazimɨn gumazamizibar mɨn ikiam. Egh pura men ingangarir gumazibar mɨn ikiam. Eghtɨ kantrin kamɨn gumazamiziba 400plan azenibar pazɨ me damuam.
